amendatorysection.catchline: Court of condemnation; appeal; judgment; bonds.
amendatorysection.para: Upon the hearing of such appeal in the district court, judgment shall be pronounced, as in ordinary cases, for the value of any such works, plant, or system. The city, village, party, or corporation owning any such plant, works, or system may appeal to the Court of Appeals. Upon a final judgment being pronounced as to the value of any such plant, works, or system, the duly constituted authorities of any such city or village shall issue and sell bonds of any such city or village to pay the amount of such value and judgment without a vote of the people.
